description:
Make meaning out of billions of tokens.

Dawn is the analytics platform for AI products.
We transform user requests and model outputs into metrics you'll actually care about.

founders.name: Zubin Koticha, Founder

Studied UC Berkeley.

generated_description:
**Dawn: Analytics for the AI Age**

Founded in 2023 and proudly a part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, Dawn is carving a niche for itself in the rapidly evolving realm of artificial intelligence. At its core, Dawn is all about making sense of vast amounts of data—specifically, it focuses on transforming billions of tokens into meaningful insights for AI products.

Their mission? To create an analytics platform that translates user requests and model outputs into actionable metrics that really matter. In simpler terms, they're taking complex AI data and distilling it down to insights that users will actually find useful. This isn’t just about data; it’s about using data to drive better AI products and user experiences.

Dawn operates out of a small but dedicated team of five, led by Group Partner Diana Hu. This lean structure suggests they're agile and focused, which is often a hallmark of startups that aim to innovate at speed.

If you’re curious to see how they’re changing the game with analytics for AI, check them out at [dawnai.com](https://www.dawnai.com/). This is a company that's not just observing the AI landscape; they're actively helping to shape it.
